title: Does Tom Brady Hold Record for Getting Paid To Say ‘I’m Going to Disney World’?
subtitle: Here's the origin story of the famous post-Super Bowl advertising slogan.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: After Super Bowl LV on Feb. 7, 2021, Disney has paid Tom Brady to say a version of "I'm going to Disney World" or "I'm going to Disneyland" four times — the most of any professional athlete.
